name: Burley Garrison
text: was very helpful through the whole process. Did not pay anything until both Thompson rep Kyle and I both was happy with the final results. I hope to work with them again in the future.

name: Fli Mi
text:
Owner says they do business in my area....estimator comes out...calls me today stuttering for words and says project manager doesn't want to come this far. Bunch of BS! Someone doesn't know what they are doing...glad I DID NOT USE THEM since honesty is NOT there strong point!
Well to your reply..
You tell me one thing, state another, renig on the end result=TELLING ME ON THE PHONE (RECORDED)ITS TOO FAR AND THIS REPLY  TELLING ME SOMETHING ELSE! Would not recommend you to ANYONE...DONT LIKE LIES!

resp.text:
Dear Fly Y,
Our business model is to be up front with all our customers and always take the time to explain the work, our process and provide detailed estimates of scope and cost. We have great relationships with our clients, indeed much of our business comes from referrals and past customers. In your case, we did not believe we could satisfy you so we thought it best to decline the work.

name: Mark Stone
text: Replaced 20 year chimney cap and flashing and rust stained chimney siding at a fair price.   Good work,

name: Doris Boston
text: They did an excellent job replacing my roof after hail damage. They were very professional. I would highly recommend this company.

name: Jon Wooten
text: Love my new roof!  Thompson Roofing and Construction did an awesome job. You couldn't ask for a better company.

name: Karen Morris

name: Helen Massey

name: Jeff Meyer
text: I had a storm repair which damaged about 6 shingles and some siding on a chimney. They repaired the shingles and cleaned up on Easter Sunday, after missing Saturday repair because of rain.  They we're a little pricey @ 600 dollars for about an hours work.

name: Russell Sage
text: This was a small repair to replace some shingles that were ripped off by high winds.  The repairs were were completed promptly by skilled professionals.  I recommend Thompson roofing and construction.

name: sheralyn goins
text: They did an excellent job with my roof and replacing my rotted trim! I couldn't be happier! Everything looks amazing!!

name: Trent Heard
text: After a severe hail storm came thru wreaking havoc upon our community, Thompson Roofing was there to take care of things and see that the job was done right with not only the roof but with our other damaged property as well. Start to Finish this was a great company to do business with!

name: Paula Stone
text: Everyone that I dealt with  were friendly and very professional. Excellent workmanship.

name: Eric Lumpkin
text: TR&C did a great job of installing pipe boots. Its been a couple of months and there are no visible leaks inside. Communications is an area for improvement.

text: They're are some great people in the building that works on your cars... And they will do a great for you always have and always will.... London Allen paint and body shop keep up the good work your guys are good... 💯💪🔥🐐💰 💵

name: Gary Holliday
text: Worked with one of the staff named Gary. He provided excellent service and a fair price. They were able to fit in my repair the next week and had my car ready the day after I dropped it off. I definitely recommend these guys!

name: Thomas Rutherford
text: Been waiting on a estimate for over 2 months just about when the guy name Gary, tells made my lower control arm is going to cost $700 for one. When I can find both of them brand new for less than that that is both of them less than a $700 cost period. Each one is like $195 to $200 a piece. I think this guy Gary, is trying to make money to put in his pocket and not Lindon Allen, or anyone else know about it.

name: Kristie Jones
text: I would highly recommend these guys.  Not only do they do good work but are also even better people.  Great experience with their services and will use again.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your positive review. We work really hard to offer our customers great service and body work.  Thanks again!

name: Kevin Rivers
text: I have been in the body shop repair business for over 30 years so I consider myself to have a better eye for quality than most people.The reason I picked this shop to do my repairs was because of Joel Allen he and did some PDR repair for me and the quality of the repair was second to none!! My review starts off with my estimate with my estimate. Gary Wrote an outstanding estimate! With Gary you not only get someone that is very knowledgeable on cars but you get someone that can actually do the repairs that he writes that is very rare! Now the Repair.They actually finish the repair sooner then they had previously estimated I was amazed most shops are always behind on their estimated time of completion. The quality of the repair was better than I expected!! they did stuff beyond what was written on the estimate and the quality was even better than I expected from Joel. Me being a painter myself I can recognize a quality paint job and I will have to say Jason put one of the best paint jobs that I have seen in the state of Alabama he is truly One of the best painters in the state!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind review!

name: Jessica Franks
text: Joel is very understanding and helpful to all your needs. They take there time and make sure the jobs done right!

text: Went by for an estimate. Didn't even bother to call me back.

resp.text: I'm so sorry to hear about this miscommunication.  I've talked to the office manager and he was under the impression that he would hear back from you to order the piece you were asking about. Thanks for letting us know about an area we can improve on.

name: Johnnie Simpson
text: I needed an estimate for my insurance and it just took a few minutes.

name: Scott Young
text: DEFINITELY RECOMMEND  APEX Restoration for any and all mitigation needs. Colby and the DKI water mitigation team did an outstanding job from start to finish.  I can't say enough about their professionalism, courtesy, care and concern for our home.  We had significant water damage from a attic mounted Air Conditioner.  The came in assessed the damage a provided us with not only a estimate but walked us through the process. They worked diligently to get our home restored as quick as possible, despite the fact that the temperature in the house was over 100 degrees.  Glad to have professionals of this caliber on our side in our time of need.

name: Richard Weaver
text: Colby and the DKI water mitigation team were rockstars!!!! They were Johnny on the spot when the city sewer backed up into our house. Very professional, very courteous, and they were very thorough. The fact that they are good at what they do is a bonus as well. Glad to have professionals on your side in your time of need. 10/10 would use again. Don’t want to HAVE to use them again, but should the need arise, they’ll be my go to.

name: Lisa Grupe
text: After Hurricane Sally damaged my new condo, DKI Apex Huntsville (Colby Swaim) was assigned to do the mitigation. Mr. Swaim was knowledgeable, personable, thorough, attentive to detail, and empathetic. He answered my questions in person, via text, on the phone, and via email. He always did what he said he would do, and he went above and beyond by sending me photos when I couldn't be present and by working with me on saving some custom cabinetry.  In a time of stress, his calm presence was very beneficial. Other condo owners expressed similar satisfaction with how neat and clean this firm was in the mold removal and water damage cleanup.  Thanks Apex DKI Huntsville!

name: Dee Dee Bond
text:
My Kitchen caught a fire in Oct. Apex did a great
Job in cleaning things up. They have 2 employees that are great works. Their kind ,organized , very hard workers. Mike and Zack are the nicest young men. Can’t find people like that these days.

name: mike smith
text: Like the others have said....if I could give a zero I would.  I have no idea why my insurance company uses Apex, other than they must be low cost.  I'm not going to waste any more of my life on these guys writing a review, but since I use google reviews I will tell you don't, just don't

name: Cameron Galbreath
text: Do not use this company. They cut corners and just want checks signed whether it's done correctly or not. There was a problem (that I personally noticed and pointed out and it was never brought to my attention by the contractor). It could have been easily fixed during the repair process but was not addressed and work that was completed now has to be undone to fix this. In addition, they have acted like this is a total inconvenience for them when they failed to notice the issue (or ignored it) in the first place. Use any other company but this one. They billed for several services they did not provide  It took over 3 weeks for anyone to even come out and evaluate/fix the issue after it was pointed out to them (they already had all of their large checks signed at this point).  And their "fix"was more like a bandaid and try and tell my wife there wont be any issues with it. Slow response times. Poor customer service. Their "customer service" team that is supposed to regular check in with you called 1 time at the beginning of the job and never heard from them again. This job was a 2-3 week job and is now on month 3. If you want repairs done timely and properly look elsewhere.

name: Amber Rausch
text: Let me start at the start of my process. I explain to them what the job was going to intel. But yet for some reason they were not listening. It took them five time coming out to my home to understand the full detail of what needed to be done. They put my repairs on the back burner as long as possible, stating that they would start this day but when it came to that day their employees were at another job. When they did come out, I was told that x y and z would be complete that day by the project manager, will only x was explained to the crew that came out and they were tasked with other jobs so they could not finish when I asked why they were not completing that days work. I was never provided samples and they wanted to charge me more for what I wanted because I had to go out and look for my own flooring, never provide with vanity or tub style before they installed them, and they claimed they did more work to the insurance company then the actual done, I fired them and finished the job for them.

name: Chest Rockwell
text:
Absolutely horrible experience with a small restoration. My insurance company recommended this company, and I'm not sure why. They are incredibly disorganized and communicate even worse. They show up when they aren't scheduled and don't show up when they are scheduled. In one case the workers just didn't show up and the PM didn't realize it until the next morning!! Too many issues to list. TERRIBLE project management and I would NEVER pay them on my own. I'm firing my insurance company (USAA) over this debacle.

Please find another restoration company if your insurance provider recommends these people, then find another insurance provider.

resp.text: Thank you for providing your feedback and letting us know about this issue. We set a high standard for ourselves and are truly sorry to hear that standard was not met in your interaction with us. Please get in touch with me so I can learn more about the problem and so I can address it. I promise you, this is NOT how we do business at Apex. My personal cell is 931-434-4706. Thank you, Michelle Keller, Customer Care

name: Christina Williams
text: I worked for them for two months. They never got materials on time. They jack the work order up to make more money for themselves. Their project managers were sloppy and smelled like old onions first thing in the morning. They tried to fire us but we quit before they had a chance. How can you work for someone when you know more than the so called managers? Before you hire those guys, you'll come out better doing it yourself! If have USAA insurance,  they prey on you. Go small if you want it done right. They don't do background checks, so you might have a murderer in your home. STAY AWAY FROM APEX! DKI!

resp.text: Please call me at (931)691-3800 I will do all in my power to resolve this issue. At DKI we strive to exceed all of our customers expectations and I am sorry that you are not happy with our services but we will do whatever it takes tor remedy this issue and make you happy.

name: Tyler Jackson
text: Fired Apex DKI today.  My insurance company and I caught them in lies so that their slow movement towards ordering materials wouldn't look as bad.  They have known of my job since February 20th, and have been paid since February.  They started work the last week of APRIL.  Their contractors are poor communicators and likely to misinterpret instructions.  We were stood up by contractors twice in 5 days.  I fired Apex DKI today.  This has been the worst experience that I've ever had with any company.  So bad that I'm going to change homeowners just because they recommended Apex.

resp.text: Please call me at (931)691-3800 I will do all in my power to resolve this issue. At DKI we strive to exceed all of our customers expectations and I am sorry that you are not happy with our services but we will do whatever it takes tor remedy this issue and make you happy.

name: Randy Little

Thank you so much for your kind words, Randy Little. We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us.

Cheers,

Apex Restoration DKI - Huntsville

name: Kevin Breuers
text: Cant give a zero, but would if I could.  Not very organized.  Recommending to Insurance Company to not use this organization.

resp.text: Please call me at (931)691-3800 I will do all in my power to resolve this issue. At DKI we strive to exceed all of our customers expectations and I am sorry that you are not happy with our services but we will do whatever it takes tor remedy this issue and make you happy.

name: TR
text:
APEX started our bathroom in May 2016. They said they would be done i n 7 to 10 days. As of July 20th they still had not finished. We had a vacation planned and upon our return, the unprofessional work ethic and attitude continued so we fired them.
The problems:
They have installed the tile flooring incorrectly, it is very uneven, has to be removed and replaced. The tile was uneven, grout lines not the same and tile was crooked. They chipped floor tile trying to fix the mistakes they made.
They rebuilt the shower walls but made the shower to large. The cabinets now do fit in place. The shower walls have to removed as does the mud bed for the shower.
The tile work they did on the shower had to removed because they had a 1 inch bow i n the wall. The bow in the wall was due to APEX's contractors putting inch of thin set or mortar behind the tile, inch thick!
The floor pan was not sealed or glued correctly. This was pointed out to me two other contractors who have given us bids.
APEX also did not install the left counter properly so they cut the stone back splash and side splash to try to make it fit. They cut the back splash uneven.
They broke fixtures in the bathroom.
I had to make them put insulation back in the walls.
Apex did paint behind the counters in the bathroom.
Apex contractors would show up and work for a couple of hours and then leave to g to another job. At times they didn't even show up.
I was told not to worry about the job in progress but the end result. If your foundation on the job is not right the finished product will be junk!
APEX would lie to us about job finish date. They would tell us we will be done by this Friday, but the tile had not been ordered or was not going to in till the next week.
The contractors would sit out back and smoke under my Gazebo! One of the guys had his girl friend hanging out all day. They did fire him after I brought this up.
I had to tell them to not smoke under my Gazebo, don't put your stuff on my grill, do not smoke on my porch, do not turn on my outside fans and for them to clean up after themselves.

resp.text: Please call me at (931)691-3800 I will do all in my power to resolve this issue. At DKI we strive to exceed all of our customers expectations and I am sorry that you are not happy with our services but we will do whatever it takes tor remedy this issue and make you happy.

name: Meghan Burns
text: Horrible, horrible!!! Do terrible work, and tell you they will be there at a time, then not there.. and no contact.

name: soule64
text: First off, a 1-star rating is too good for this company. Apex was referred to me by USAA for a water damage insurance claim that occurred in early December, and they just now finished. This was not a huge project - about 8 sheets of drywall and 2 doors, and I elected to paint, yet it still took nearly 4 months to complete. The drywall work was so bad that it took me an entire weekend to prepare it for paint. Debris was dumped in my trash can despite them billing for removal. I voiced my concerns with a quality manager, but heard nothing else after. Communication with Apex was frustratingly bad. Calls to project managers would go to voicemail and would not be returned. Weeks went by without updates despite my numerous calls and texts. I don't know how these guys are still in business, but I do plan on voicing my concerns with USAA to at least get them off their recommenced list so this never happens to another veteran.

resp.text: Please call me at (931)691-3800 I will do all in my power to resolve this issue. At DKI we strive to exceed all of our customers expectations and I am sorry that you are not happy with our services but we will do whatever it takes tor remedy this issue and make you happy.

name: DelAnn Sundwall
text: These young men were very friendly. The problems were, they didn’t return very often (nor when they said they would come) to check on the progress of drying out our home, we had to change positions of fans because they would not returning for long periods of time. Apex was careless in how they performed their work, the equipment was running so long (unchecked) that it killed a large section of our grass. We finally had to move around the equipment in the yard to keep from killing more grass. They finally picked up all there equipment 30 days later.  After job completed we had a heating and air person check in crawl space, only to find Apex left some duct work torn. We are insured through USAA AND ALL THIS HAS BEEN FILED WITH THEM. I PLEADED WITH USAA TO NOT USE APEX FOR FUTURE WORK.  I hope this helps anyone in search of a restoration company.

name: Krystina Teal
text: I would give zero stars if I could. This company is so unorganized and couldnt keep anything straight. I gave them our information multiple times and they could never keep it straight. After aeveral attempts to talk to the person they sent out to look at our roof, I decided to go with somosom else .

resp.text:
Thank you for providing your feedback and letting us know about this issue, Krystina Teal. We set a high standard for ourselves and are truly sorry to hear that standard was not met in your interaction with us. Please get in touch with us on (256) 883-6000 and we'd be happy to help you out.

Cheers,

Apex Restoration DKI - Huntsville

name: Kimberly Flynn
text: Great experience working with APEX. Would recommend!

resp.text: Thank you for your review. We strive to have all of our customers feel this way about us. Please let me know if there is anything that we can do for you in the future.

name: S W
text: Few workers. Only worked couple days a week. Caused extra expense on other contractors. Expected job finally completed within a couple of months. Insurance discrepancies during particular job.

resp.text:
Thank you for providing your feedback and letting us know about this issue, Shawn Woodard. We set a high standard for ourselves and are truly sorry to hear that standard was not met in your interaction with us. Please get in touch with us on (256) 883-6000 and we'd be happy to help you out.

Cheers,

Apex Restoration DKI - Huntsville

name: Shavona Wactor
text: Great company

resp.text: Thank you for your review. We strive to have all of our customers feel this way. Please let us know if there is anything that we can do for you in the future.

name: Greg Robinson
text:
I worked with Cole Jones in getting a quote for our roof.  Cole was responsive, on time, and thorough with his appointment, inspection and sitting down with us about the condition of the roof and options for a roof replacement.

Sandy followed up with scheduling the roof replacement and all the paperwork which was in fantastic order.

Blair showed up on the job, arranged for good weather (just kidding) and did what they said they would do when they said they would do.

The knowledge, expertise and quality was evident at the end and we are very satisfied with our roof.  It has been four months and not a single leak and they also replaced our gutters.

It was a pleasure working with them.

name: Ian Thomas
text:
We had a great experience with Blair. I did my homework and got quotes from 5 other companies, but Blair blew us away with their authenticity, local roots and competitive pricing. After getting a lot of quotes, it was clear that at our price point, all the windows were essentially the same quality with the same bells and whistles; it was the install that would really make or break the project.

I was confident that our windows would be installed correctly and if any issues were to come up, that Blair would resolve them. The install went smoothly, a little over a month after buying. We had metal windows and the guys took the time to cut them out by hand and ensure our new windows went in seamlessly. Instead of just throwing up wood surrounds, they capped the windows with custom aluminum before sealing it all up.

From beginning to end, Craig Blair was very patient in walking through everything with us and ensuring we were informed and comfortable. I feel very confident in being able to receive service if anything goes wrong in the future. I highly recommend Blair.

resp.text: Thanks Ian. Our pleasure.

name: J Baker
text: I contacted Blair Exteriors to replace the roof on my home.  I was terribly disappointed.  They almost destroyed our beautiful scrubs, which had been growing for 15 years, by throwing the old shingles off the roof onto our scrubs.  It will take years to get them back to form.  Instead of having brackets for their ladders they placed their ladders against our gutters scrapping the paint and bending the gutters.  On top of that I noticed the workers standing on the gutters.  I reported this to Dan Aycock, the Blair representative, and when he finally came by the house all he talked about was how he was going to do something about this in the future.  They had the highest quote, but I wanted to support a local business and felt I would get a better job.  I hate that I am writing this, but others should be aware.  J K Baker

resp.text: Hey Mr Baker, I spoke with Dan and the installation crew about the issues you experienced. I want to first thank you for your business and apologize for the issues. This is not the experience we want to leave any customer  with. I believe our office staff has already reached out to you but if you need anything please reach back out to us. Reviews like this help us see where to improve. Thanks

name: Kelly Horwitz
text: In an age when everyone seems to have a bad story about finding a contractor, Blair Exteriors is a breath of fresh air.  We needed a new roof - a project I was dreading. Blair made it easy and efficient. They are the consummate professionals. They arrived on time and worked until the sun set to get our roof on in a single day. Then they returned the next day to make sure everything was fully cleaned up. Make them your first call when you need work done on your house!

name: Brandon Thompson
text: Blair replaced my roof last year and had an issue a year later that was not their fault but they were quick to help get it resolved. Great company and great staff. Russel was very helpful.

name: Hillary Cherry
text:
The salesperson contacted me and set up my appointment.  When he called the day of my appointment he stated he lived in Hueytown and did not want to travel an hour across town nor he did he want to drive an hour an half back home.  He then gave me an out of this world number and when I told him we received quotes much lower he said go with them.  How rude! For a company to have 4.8 stars out of 5 one would expect better customer service.

11/1/19:  I am upgrading my review to 3 stars.  I was contacted by the Director of Marketing at Blair Exteriors and he was very apologetic about my situation.  My husband and I would like to personally thank you and your team for reaching out to us and taking care of this situation.  This shows your commitment to providing excellent customer service.  We will definitely reconsider using your services in the future.  Again, thank you.

resp.text: We would be happy to work with you on a future project. Thank you for taking our call and letting us make it right!

name: David Counts
text:
Sales:  Jay was most informative.  Shared many options with us and respected our budget limitations.  He was never "pushy". Was able to find some affordable customization opportunities for us also.  He kept in touch throughout the process, not just after the sale was made.

Financing:  Jay also shared some financing options that were most helpuf.

Products;  We purchased new windows, siding for the entire home, gutters, and chimney caps. Everything looks great.  With the new windows and the additional insulation wrap that come with the siding, our electric bill has already shown an improvement (even with all the 90+ days we have had).

Workcrews:  Russell, the project manager kept us up to date for the times the different crews (one for the windows and siding, one for the gutters, and one for the chimney caps) would come by and kept us up-to-date with the progress of each crew.  The work was accomplished much faster than we anticipated.  The crews were professional,well versed in their craft, unfailingly polite, and were very careful to check with us for anything out of the ordinary before proceeding.  They answered any questions that we had and they were also very careful with their clean up everyday.

Bottom Line:  I would recommend Blair and commend them for their excellent service.

name: Nancy Prater
text: Love my beautiful new roof!  All my neighbors are talking about the efficiency of the crew.  They can't believe it was a one day project.  Everyone arrived on time and worked safely. Excellent support staff in the office setting up the installation date and selecting the matching shingles!

resp.text: Thank you! We have some of the best crews! Your roof looks amazing!

name: Brandon Parker
text: We were really pleased with the quality and professionalism of Blair Exteriors. Our roof looks really great and the crew was very polite. Thanks for doing such a stand up job!

resp.text: We strive to provide every customer with exceptional customer service.

name: Sarah Shelton
text: I have used Blair Remodeling for three projects. I have used them to remodel a shower, seal the shingles on my house and to finish an existing shed. The work looks incredible. The best part about this company was that when we gave them a budget they were able to come up with a way to do the work within budget. We will hire Blair for any future projects we have. We would highly recommend this company to anyone.

name: David Shepherd
text: We chose Blair to replace 29 wood windows with very nice modern vinyl windows - low e gas, double hung, reflective coating, etc. The sales team was patient, knowledgeable, respectful, and above all honest. The pricing was a very fair value for what we purchased. The installers were great to work with. Courteous, professional, & thorough. They took their time to do it right the first time and were focused on the job before them NOT trying to get to the next job! The exterior trim work was exceptional. Everything the salesman told me would be done was completed by the installers without me having to bird dog them to do it. Very happy we chose Blair.

resp.text: We are thrilled that you are excited about how your window project turned out! Thank you for sharing your experience.

name: Elizabeth Williams
text: Blair Remodeling did a great job restoring my house. My house was built in 1952 so it was very important to me to preserve the old world charm of the house. Blair Remodeling replaced wood siding with James Hardie plank siding. They were able to match and install new windows that are identical to those that were original to the house. They also replaced the roof. All of this was done without jeopardizing the character of the house and preserving the integrity of the structure. I will definitely use them again for future remodeling projects.

name: Brandon Quick
text: Blair put on a new roof on our house after we discovered hail damage.  They were a pleasure to work with through the entire process.  They helped us pick out a new color and helped us decide on the GAF golden pledge warranty.  The roof installation crew took time to answer my questions and did a great job.  They were courteous and cleaned up after themselves.   The new roof looks great and I am glad I went with the color change.  They were a little slow getting to my last post installation punch list item but my overall experience with Blair was positive and they did what they said they would do and did a top quality job.  I would use them again and highly recommend them.

resp.text: We are delighted that you had a great experience!

name: TriceUA
text: I had previously wrote a review stating issues I had with the windows I had purchased from Blair due to leaking problems and would like to revise my previous review. The leak issue was finally fixed from another contractor and the windows that Blair installed for me were never the issue. They actually remained in excellent condition! My contractor said it was amazing that the windows weren't damaged at all because of the leak; which was due to poor trim and frame installation of Signature Homes. The quality and craftmanship of Blair Windows is top notch and I recommend them to anyone!

resp.text: I want to thank you for the newest review of Blair. We will always be there to help our customers. Thank you for being a Blair customer.

name: Randy Moon
text: Superior sales staff. Excellent installers. Wonderful office staff. You will not regret working with these people.

resp.text: Thanks Randy! I hope you enjoy your new deck with family and friends.

name: Casey OQuinn
text: Can't say enough about the team at Blair.  They are without a doubt the most professional craftsmen around.  From start to finish the job was extremely smooth.  They show up when they say they will and the new windows we had installed are worth every penny and look fantastic.  Extremely happy with the results and I highly recommend Billy and his team!!

name: James Wilson
text:
Blair Remodeling replaced 26 of my old wooden double hung windows with Wincore vinyl windows.  I first met with Craig Blair on April.  He gave me a quote that same day.  He was very patient and was definitely not in a hurry to leave, even though it was late in the day.  He answered all of my questions.  After I thought about it for a while he came back another afternoon to answer more questions and show the demo window unit to my wife.  Again, very patient and in no hurry to be anywhere.

Made down payment in April.  He said they would install in early June.  That is exactly what happened.  The install took only three days.  They started on a Wednesday and finished on a Friday.  The install crew consisted of three guys.  They were extremely polite and cleaned up their mess each day.

There was only one major issue.  There were streaks and smudges on every window.  It looked like some kind of sealant that was not cleaned off during the manufacturing process.  I met with the lead installer on Friday morning and pointed this out to him and asked that he clean the windows.  He was very condescending and obviously did not want to clean the windows.  He said he would but I knew he would not.  I went back to work (my wife was home but said she would not enforce the window cleaning)

The project was finished when I got home Friday afternoon.  The windows looked great but . . . You guessed it.  There were still streaks and smudges on all the windows.  Not wanting to be a pain, I tried cleaning the windows myself.  The sealant was very difficult to remove.  It would not come off with glass cleaner alone.  I decided this should definitely be Blair’s responsibility.

I asked for a meeting with Criag Blair.  We met the following week.  He was very polite and patient.  He agreed to have the windows cleaned and address a few other minor issues.

It took a while, and to be fair, I was out of town for a week but we finally coordinated on having the windows cleaned.  The crew that did the installation came back out.  They came while I was at work.  My wife was home but declined to be the inspector.  They finished cleaning about 3 PM.  They waited for me to get home at 4:30.  We walked around and inspected all 26 windows.  There were a few touch ups but for the most part they did a good job.

In summary, I was very pleased and satisfied with the entire process.  I will definitely use Blair Remodeling in for any future projects.  Craig Blair is the best.  I totally trust him and I know that he will do whatever is necessary to make sure I am satisfied.  Hopefully, Blair will add cleaning the windows to their standard installation procedure.

resp.text: Thanks James!

name: Ed Guui
text: Blair Remodeling did an excellent job replacing the roof on one of my commercial properties. The job was very professionally done in a speedy manner.  The crew cleaned up the area as if they were never there.  The contract explicitly stated some shrubs or plants may be damaged due to the nature of the work. The building is surrounded with ornamental shrubs and trees. They took extra care to make sure nothing was damaged.  The job, the quality of the material, the speed the work was completed and the value for my money makes me happy to recommend Blair Remodeling. In fact, shortly after my job was completed, I had the opportunity to suggest to a friend to work with them on his remodeling project. He picked them and I followed up with him a couple weeks later to find he too had the same outstanding results.  I highly recommend Blair Remolding.

name: Vicki Ricketts
text: Have used Blair Exterior for years and have never been disappointed. A solid company with quality workmanship.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to let us know how we did!

name: Steve Smith
text: We had 10 window replacements installed by Blair. The salesman that came was knowledgeable and courteous with our time, We will use them again.

resp.text: It was great working with you Steve!

name: Stephen Savincki
text: The work was top notch..... they were quick to respond to questions/concerns and treated us as if we were their only client! You will not go wrong using Blair I promise you!

name: Daniel Ferry
text:
We used Blair Remodeling to replace our roof. Their team was extremely knowledgeable about construction and roofing. They walked us through all of our options, and didn't pressure us. Their crew was professional , hard-working, and respectful of our home. They kept the work site (our yard) clean, and finished the project on schedule. We were so pleased with their work that we had them extend the roof over our patio and screen it in- not a an easy job on our house. They did beautiful work.

We are looking to do some window replacements this spring, and we will be calling Blair. We highly recommend them.

name: Manning Willingsby
text: Installations were all great and done in a timely manner. Crews were very conscientious and did excellent cleanup. We will be happy to contact Blair for any additional projects.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words! We strive to be the best! We can't wait for your next project!

name: Suzanne Picklesimer
text: We were pleased with the whole experience! We had windows replaced and exterior painting done. Everyone from the representative to the repair and painting crews did a great job!

resp.text: We are grateful that you had a great experience! Blair Remodeling is dedicated to our customers.

name: Florence Stewart
text: I scheduled for an estimate to replace a damaged metal roof.  The day they were to come out t received a call and was told Blair does not do metal roofs.  I had told.their receptionist when I called that I needed repairs for a metal roof.  The caller did apologize and stated the receptionist should have told me that before she scheduled the home visit.  I waited two days for the appointment and this was time wasted. Now I'm back to square one.  So disappointing 😟😟

resp.text: Hey Florence, It was great talking to you this morning. I hope we handled the situation to your satisfaction. Please call us anytime.

name: Jeanee Hawley
text: The salesman and installers were good but was delayed to weather. It rained on the day of install but they protected my roof and finished the install after the rain stopped. I would recommend Blair Remodeling to anyone.

resp.text: Weather is unpredictable but we have such a great team that does everything they can to protect your home. Thank you!

name: Chad Wilson
text: Blair Remodeling did an excellent job on the re-roof of my home. Very professional throughout the entire process; I would absolutely recommend them for your roofing needs. Very thorough from start to finish. Roof looks great!

name: Trey Moseley
text: Fantastic experience. Very well run company with outstanding employees, service, and craftsmanship. I have recommended them to friends and will definitely utilize their services again when needed.

name: Gary Wyatt
text: The guys at Blair went far beyond the call of duty to fix my roofing problems in time to sell my house. They diagnosed the problem, found an economical solution, then did exactly what they said they would do. I highly recommend them.

resp.text: We were happy to help! Thank you for your nice words!

name: Brian Dickerson
text:
When the time comes to remodel your home, look no further than the folks at Blair Remodeling.  We had the best experience with our home renovation, which included a new roof, windows, and a deck. Their professionalism, knowledge, and attention to detail throughout the project exceeded our expectations.  That trait is difficult to find these days with many contractors, but Blair impressed us from beginning to end. The crew was outstanding and delivered a quality installation in a timely manner that made our house look amazing.
We highly recommend the Blair team for your next project.  No wonder they have so many repeat customers!

name: Heather G.
text:
Billy and his crew were fantastic from beginning to the end and beyond. Billy is so easy to get in touch with - such a rare quality. He is super responsive, and he does what he says and in the time frame he specifies.

Being in the construction industry for over 10-years, I was not expecting how thorough and clean his crews were. I was majorly impressed with Mickey and the crew. They did a fabulous job on the roof, going above and beyond to make sure that any issue was taken care of. They really take a lot of pride in their work, and it shows.

Their whole team has been on-point with any concern after the initial install. Billy was fantastic in handling the claim with the insurance company. He definitely knows what he is doing and made everything super easy for us. We are super satisfied with the office and the field staff. They are thorough, considerate, clean and treat you like family.

I highly recommend Blair Remodeling for any roofing and repair/remodeling needs. There are a lot of scammers out there, so be careful and use someone you can trust. We trust Billy and his crews.

name: Virgil Williams
text: I used Blair many years ago and I am glad that I did. I had an issue with the windows they installed. They came out and verified it was a manufacturers defect and replaced my windows. Craig Blair was and still is a pleasure to work with.

resp.text: Thanks for being a Blair customer!

name: Jonathan Schneider
text: We selected Blair Remodeling for two projects - replacing our siding and building a new deck. We had a wonderful experience! Everyone at Blair was friendly and knowledgeable. Throughout the projects, there was clear communication, and we were consistently updated with timeframes and next steps.  And the workmanship/quality was top-notch! We got exactly what we wanted! We plan to use Blair Remodeling for our next round of home improvements.

name: Sammy Beasley
text: I had a great experience with Blair Exteriors. I had a deck rebuilt and 5 windows replaced.

name: Jerry
text: Exceptional service and selection of products. Installers were professional and timely. On-site supervisor reviewed work and any corrections were promptly made before leaving for the day. Craig Blair was on top of the project from pre-sale to post job completion.

name: Louii Rdgz
text: Blair Best roofing company out there coming from a worker!

name: Scott McWaters
text: Loved working with Blair Remodeling on our roof! They were beyond attentive with their costumer service, and the workmanship was nothing but professional. We plan to call them soon to install new windows.

name: Alan Cole
text: We received contracts from 3 companies and chose Blair to do our roof and windows and could not be happier. they took care of everything from start to finish.

name: Tony
text: Came by to give me a quote.  Stated quote would be delivered 2 days after inspection.  Never received it despite calling to remind them.  Waste of time and if this is how they do their quotes is this also how they schedule their work?

name: Heyward Gould
text: I have used Blair to replace the roof at my home, office and boat dock. Excellent work. We had a dedicated professional walk us through all our choices. He was on site for installation and followed up with a phone call. Couldn't be happier with the service and the finished product. I highly recommend Blair.

name: Steve Gates
text: Best decision I made is to change out my windows! I did not want the cheapest windows but I wanted the best windows for the best price and that is what I got from Blair Exteriors.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words.

name: David Lacey
text: Blair Remodeling did a fantastic job. Everything was done as quoted and installers were very professional. Will use them again if we do anymore exterior projects.

resp.text: Thank you for the nice words. We look forward to working with you again in the future.

name: Stacey Lee
text: We used Blair Remodeling to replace our windows. They were fantastic! They were done very quickly and did great work. We will definitely use them again!

name: M Rose
text: Sometimes it's not doing the job 100% right that signals a great company, it's what they do when something goes wrong. This past spring, Blair Remodeling put a new roof on our house. The job went well and the roof seemed fine, but in the months afterward our cars got 3 flat tires from roofing nails; one tire was so damaged we needed to buy a new one plus a mate for it. Here's where I give high marks to Blair: they responded quickly, didn't argue or try to blame somebody else, and immediately compensated us for the damage. This is why I would recommend them. In this life nothing is perfect and things do go wrong, even for the best of us. If you go with Blair you can rest assured that they will stand behind what they do and take care of you, whatever happens.

name: Ronald Schrader
text:
Overall great work.
My wife and I are both very happy and wouldn't change a thing.
Will use Blair again .

name: Scott Danson
text: Courteous and professional. Quick response to messages and phone calls. Very happy with the price and quality of work.

name: Richard Stewart
text:
Blair Building and Remodelling have done a great job for us, every time we have hired them to do work on our house.

Everyone's professional and they do good work.

name: Sheri Partain
text: We had a lovely experience working with Blair. The people are so pleasant to work with and showcase the utmost professionalism and craftsmanship. Thank you thank you thank you!

name: The Plotts
text: Wonderful, professional service! Trustworthy and dependable. Working with Blair was a fabulous experience from start to finish.

name: David Eberhardt
text: From selling their product and services, to excellent completion of a challenging siding and exterior renovation project, Blair was exceptional in the guidance and workmanship they provided us. Definitely would use again and recommend to others!

name: Michael Chaz
text: Professional company with professional staff and installers. I would recommend them to anyone looking for a new deck or windows.

name: D Ross
text: We are happy with our new deck. We are imagining family gathered for many years to come.

resp.text: Family is important to us at Blair Remodeling. Enjoy you beautiful deck!

name: Kristy Reynolds
text: They did a great job and were very quick yet thorough.  Nice too!

name: Randy Wolfe
text: Good Job. Looks good. Cleanup could be better.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words.

name: Bill Hart
text: Nice showroom.  Easy to see and experience  different offerings. Friendly,  non pushy staff.

name: Bama Jim
text: One Star is one too many.  I contacted this roofing company 1st.  Mainly due to the glowing reviews here on Google.  They're HIGHLY overrated I can say that with full certainty.  I set an appointment with them, and was told someone would be out.  It rained that morning but was going to clear later in the day but he canceled.  Said he'd be out the next day or two.  Four-five days later I write and ask "where you at?" so he says that he had "other appointments to take care of after I cancelled."  I CANCELLED??  It RAINED.  Ok, says he's coming out again... 10 AM.  At 4:30 he finally gets around to emailing me and says that he's "running behind" and not going to make it.  So giving the benefit of the doubt I allow him to reschedule yet AGAIN for Monday 3/12, again at 10 AM.  No show, no email, no call.  I don't care if he would do the job for $1,000 less than anyone else, I'd never use Blair for anything including roofing my dog kennel.

name: Tom Noon
text: Great experience working with them.

resp.text: We enjoyed working with you as well! Thanks Tom!

name: Michael Henderson
text: Fantastic crew, does amazing work!

name: Lonnie Goldberg
text: Extremely professional and reliable.  Quality work on both jobs with very competitive pricing

name: Shery Long

name: Z.A. Corbett

name: Destiny Fitch
text: Love it :)

name: Aunt Mimi
text: Awesome deal on siding and windows!  Hap & Pete were great, and their crew did a wonerful job!  They also insulated my grandmothers house years ago!  I would recommend.

name: Decie
text: Isbell handled the spray foam insulation, vinyl, and gutters on my new construction. The cost was fair and the work was quick and accurate. Keith did a great job sharing information and getting the work done in a timely manner. Steve did a hell of a job on the vinyl, and left not a single shred of material on the ground at the end of each day. The spray foam is one of the best decisions that we made for this house. The black gutters against the white house look awesome. Good job guys!

name: Chris Kozak
text: Keith and his crew put a deck next to our above ground pool.  It surpassed our expectations, and the craftsmanship is outstanding.  We are beyond pleased with their work.  We had a few small adjustments but thanks to the quick communication and responsiveness to our changes by Keith, the project finished in a timely manner and surpassed our initial vision of what it was going to look like.  We will call Isbell and Keith when we decide to do our siding and patio covering.  Thanks Keith and Isbell for a professional job well done!

name: Hayden Reed
text: I recently had some siding and exterior trim work done on my house, and Isbell did a fantastic job. Working with Keith was easy and they delivered on time at a great value. They went above and beyond to ensure every cap was clean and square and even readjusted my screen door in the process. Would highly recommend and will be using Isbell again in the future.

name: Lynda Fields
text: Isbell siding made my home look better than new!! I'm so proud...thanks!!

name: Wanda Littleton
text: Twice we have used Isabel services for window replacement and both times we were very pleased with the job.  They use quality products and install them with care.  I highly recommend them.

name: Robert Sabbagh
text: Isbell siding built us a  fabulous top for our existing deck. The top was good looking and strong, enough for a good size man to walk on the top of it with no regret, Mat done all the work himself and was very polite and friendly during all his work. Keith Kennemur  gave us a great quote and came by  a lot to check on the progress in building our new top. The owner contacted me and stated that I would have to find someone else, they don't stand behind their product and hung up. I would be extremely cautious using Isbell for ANY service.

resp.text: This review is very inaccurate. The house he is speaking of was roofed by Isbell for another home owner 8 years ago. He wanted us to come and do repairs for free and was told the warranty was nontransferable. Apparently he did not like the answer. Also I (Jeff Isbell) am the owner of Isbell Services and I would never hang up on a customer Write or Wrong.

text: It took a few days to come out for the job but I later understood why. They must be in high demand due to their impeccable work and customer service! A few bricks from another area of the facade came off after repair and installation. They came and repaired it a couple of days later without a call having to be made. Our family will recommend and definitely use Isbell again for any home repairs!

name: Jason Polancich
text: Another example of an unreliable local Tuscaloosa home improvement company. Had them out week before Thanksgiving for a quote to replace/repair gutters on a historic home in downtown Tuscaloosa. Was told Id have a quote out by the next week and they'd be able to start within a couple weeks. Two weeks went by and no quote. I called them, was transferred to a rep named Mike "who handles all the gutters." He told me he'd follow back up with me by the afternoon. Now, first week of January, called back and got mike who said "We're not going to be able to help you on that job." Im guessing it was too low a cost threshold for them, but it would have been very nice to have known that back in November. Great people. Don't advertise gutter repair/replacement if you dont actually do the work!

text: I'm a grad student who just bought their first home. Being incredibly busy during working hours, Isbell was super easy to work with via email and text to arrange for gutter installation. They are in demand so you may need to wait a week or two until they can get to you, but for the quality and price it is worth being a little patient. I will definitely call them again should the need arise. I do recommend them if you need their services.

I had Isbell Insulation come out again this week and add a board and batten siding product to part of the front of my house. Frank and Jeff came in the morning and work was completed by lunch time. I could have not been more pleased with their quality of work and professionalism. These technicians really take a lot of pride in their work and it shows. This product has about half inch insulation rigid backing that makes it more solid. Looks like actual wood when driving up to the house. It matches other wooden board and batten we have on front of our house. I was tired of painting and replacing weather worn boards. We ordered color that matches the paint we have on the house. No more on ladder for me on this particular wall of the house. Once again i do recommend Isbell. Really nice technicians that do a great job. As other time price i believe was real reasonable.

resp.text:
Katrina, we have a large area of North Alabama where we provide free estimates at absolutely no cost to the customer.  It includes 72 different zip code areas and most of the metropolitan areas. Unfortunately your home is in Gurley which is not included in the free estimate area.

Our typical time to get out to jobs for estimates has historically been one or two days maximum.  It’s a source of pride for us.  But during Covid many people have chosen to stay home and upgrade their homes.  Unfortunately, like all businesses that specialize in home remodeling, we have a backlog of several weeks of work.  We have been working overtime to get our lead times back to normal and are making headway in catching up.

We offer our sincere apology for any inconvenience this has caused.  We feel it’s more important to be honest and upfront about the current backlog than to promise quicker lead times and then fail to deliver on them.

We have had problems with our VOIP phone system all day, experiencing several dropped calls. Again, we apologize if this has caused any of our customers to feel anything less than important.

name: Casey G
text:
We had a great experience with Madison Glass Company.

We recently replaced the builder grade shower in our master bathroom with a new tile shower. After the tiling was complete, I reached out to five different companies in the area to come give me quotes on a glass shower door and surround as well as an interior window pane for an insulated double pane window that one of kids had managed to crack.

Out of all five companies that came out, I felt like Wade and Kevin from Madison glass were the only ones that tried to assess the job and recommend the best solution for us. They were the only one of the five companies that realized there was not a stud behind the tile where the door was to be installed and actually recommended a solution that ended up saving us money (though they also made sure I knew they were capable of going with the more expensive solution if we decided to go that route).

Using the information that they provided, I was able to go back and get a slightly cheaper quote from one of the other companies. Despite that, I went with Madison Glass because I felt I could trust Wade and Kevin to do the job right. I'm glad I did.

We had a small hiccup with the manufacturer on the first replacement window and shower door that came in, but Wade and Kevin set us up for the mean time and made sure to prioritize getting back out as soon as the replacement glass came in.

The shower looks great, the service was excellent, they let us know what to expect and then kept us informed throughout the process, and we ended up spending less than what we expected. I have already recommended them to a friend and will certainly use them in the future.

resp.text: We understand that it is difficult to find honest, dependable help. As a company, we want integrity to be the norm, not the exception. With custom installations, there are bound to be a few bumps in the road, but it's the way people handle those bumps that truly matter. I'm glad we were able to come through for you!

text: Bad window repair - loose in the sash, and they have bad customer service - woman unnecessarily became rude, maybe she was having a bad day before I called.

resp.text: Ms. Vargas, We are disappointed that your experience was less than satisfactory. It appears that the window repair was done in our shop. As I looked into the circumstances of your review, I was told that our customer service representative contacted you shortly after your initial contact to schedule sending an installer out to your home instead of having you bring your window back into the shop. We want to make sure that you understand you are important to us. I have just been informed that our guys completed this repair Friday. I hope we were able to rectify the issues with your initial window installation. We do hope you contact us if you have any future glass needs.

name: Krissi Harpel
text: All the reviews were great so I was excited to get started with this company.  Their representative came to the house and brought a contractor, I was told it would take about a week to generate an estimate of materials.  During that week I sent some colors I liked and a couple of questions and I was not getting any response from the designer .  Once the week was up I sent an email to the designer and told her I needed someone who was going to be responsive to emails .  She immediately responded saying that she could not get my cabinets to meet our timeline and I would have to find someone else ...which if she had paid attention I had asked for an estimate on painting and replacing .  I then left a message for someone from management. to call me and got no response.  Very very disappointing

resp.text: I spoke with Krissi and explained a few items to her concerning her project and attempted to assist her with her project even though Coastal is not performing the project.  Hopefully this will help.  We do not paint cabinets and recommend under normal conditions that this not be done.  Typically, a paint job will have to repeated in the near term due to underlying issues with cabinets themselves.

name: Hilton Perry
text: For many months my wife and I  have wanted to remodel our bath but finding some one that was knowledgeable and and responsive was impossible and had almost given up. A friend told us to call  Coastal Kitchen & Bath and with in just a few days we were set up to meet and go over what we wanted and measure. The next week we were picking out the flooring, cabinets and fixtures we wanted. Today we have the bath that we had visioned for moths. Very responsive and courteous.

resp.text: Thanks for the review.  It can be amazing what a kitchen remodel can do for the appearance of your home and your piece of mind.

name: Chelsie Sotero
text: I have had the pleasure of working with Jill here and she is a delight! This company should be proud to have her as an employee. She is very knowledgeable, helpful and very friendly. I will tell everyone I know to make sure to stop in!!!

resp.text: you're going to love your new mud room

name: me to you
text:
The lady, Jill, was very helpful.  If you go there you have to order what you see on display.  Ordering means a 3 or 4 week delay.  They have a variety of everything related to the bathroom.  My apologies because I did not take photos.

My contractor wants it yesterday. Seems the stuff is never there fast enough for them. They want to go to Lowe's, pick it up, and install it the same day.

resp.text: Thanks for the opportunity.  We do not keep cabinets in stock since there are so many options, sizes and colors.  Unfortunately, contractors can experience delays and then want everything yesterday, like you said.
