The technicians contacted me the day prior to arrange a convenient time to replace the damaged glass, in turn showed up promptly at the scheduled time. Both technicians, # 80 and #95 were the utmost courteous and professional, went right to work, answered all the questions very honestly and forthright.  They completed the task and the workmanship was stellar from start to finish.
I would highly recommend Huntsville Glass to anyone now and in the future.

name: H2Brew
text: In this case, do not buy local. I could have saved over $700 buying this glass online, and it would have arrived already, but I really wanted to support local businesses. I spent over $1100 for a few pieces of trapezoids and rectangles at 5/8" low-e. It has been over a month and the glass is still not here. Just excuses about broken or mis-sized pieces. I will have the glass someday, it will probably be the wrong size and I will have to live with it. Never again though.

text: My experience with Huntsville Glass has been totally positive.  They have been friendly, helpful, courteous, prompt, competent, and go the extra mile.  They will get my future business.

text: If I could give 10 stars, I would. From start to finish Huntsville Glass Company was professional and speedy! I called to get an estimate on a half round window that had a broken seal. I was so impressed I asked them to replace the glass in a master shower enclosure. They measured while they were there, and I had an estimate within a few days. The glass came a week earlier than expected, and James and John came back and replaced the whole enclosure in less than an hour. Such a great experience. Thank you!

resp.text: Lori, your thorough review is greatly appreciated. We are glad to have been able to help you and see that our technicians took great care of you with all of your glass needs. If you have any future glass needs we would be happy to help!

text: We had an accident with a window at home. I've done business with these wonder folks through work on multiple occasions and I didn't think twice about calling them first. I was given a fair price and a 2 to 3 week date of turnover. Day 13 and the window is back in with a perfect fit. Angie, again I want to thank you and the guys for such great service and customer service. I'll throw all the business I can at y'all. Thank you so much!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words Chad. We are grateful for your loyalty and really appreciate you taking the time to give us a thorough review. We look forward to helping you in the future!

name: Eric Skeldon
text: Had 3 windows replaced. John May and James Davis (installers) did a very professional job. Lowe's wanted to replace the entire window sills for the 3 windows. Highly recommended.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing Eric. Sadly we hear similar stories all the time where people are told by other companies that they have to replace the entire window and not just the glass. I am glad you found us and that our technicians took great care of you. If you have any future glass needs we would be happy to help!

name: Jimmy Parry
text: The outside pane of glass on one of our windows was broken by a bird or a frisbee.  We called HSV Glass Company, they sent someone out to give us an estimate. We paid for the glass,  They were very flexible as we had to reschedule the installation many times.  James Davis Sr. and James Davis Jr. came out and replaced the broken window glass.  They were professional and fast.  I will be calling them again when I have broken glass in the future.

resp.text: FANTASTIC! Your feedback is very much appreciated. It's great to hear that our guys were able to accommodate your scheduling needs. We look forward to working with you again.

name: Grace Black
text: Called to get an estimate and the woman on the phone was so rude! They obviously don’t care about doing business with people or fostering lasting business relationships to encourage repeat customers. I guess they don’t need business. Called K&M glass instead and they were so friendly and answered all my questions. Will recommend K&M to everyone that needs glass repair!

resp.text: Grace, we are so incredibly sorry that you had a bad experience. That is never our intention and we are addressing the problem. If you call back and ask for Stephanie she will take great care of you. We sincerely apologize for the bad customer service you received and we hope to be able to earn back your business in the future.

name: Margaret Dukeman
text: As usual Stephanie was a delight to work as was your new employee.  However, when I arrived your other employee who sits in the West corner never made any motion to see or ask if I needed any help.  As I stood there waiting and waiting.  Finally Stephanie peeked our from what looked like a lunch area to see if I needed help.  She was obviously at lunch but she stopped her lunch and came out and helped me.  Still the other lady never did look up or ask if she could help.  This isn’t the type of service I have grown accustomed to at your place of business. Your company is far better than that.  You got five stars because of Stephanie and her exceptional attention to detail and always providing me with exactly what I needed!  Not just every store is willing to work with an artist and their creative ideas and carry them through in a stellar manner.

resp.text: Margaret, we really appreciate you providing a thorough review of your most recent experience. Your feedback is very important to us and we will do everything we can to ensure a better experience the next time. We hope to continue to be a great source for your glass needs.

resp.text: Thank you for letting us know about your experience Becky. We are glad to hear the replacement glass looks great. We would be happy to help you again in the future!

text: They underpromised and overdelivered.  I needed replacement glass for a double hung window that had lost its seal. I was told it would be a couple of business days before they scheduled a measurement appt and they scheduled the next day!  I was told it would take 2-3 weeks for the replacement glass to be installed and John May and James Davis, Sr.  were back the next week to install. They were in and out in less than 15 minutes!

resp.text: With so much going wrong, it sure is nice when something goes right. We are at the mercy of our distributors with regards to receiving the products we order in a timely fashion. Unfortunately, things don't always go as planned. We are so glad they came through for you and we were able to get it installed so quickly.

name: Meike Fisk
text: I was selling my property and had two windows that needed replacing. One had thermal seal failure and one was broken.  I had gotten a quote from a “window” company and they said the whole window plus the transom above it would have to be replaced and their cost was over 1700.00.  I called another glass company and they have yet to call me back to even come out and look at replacing the glass only. I called  Huntsville Glass and I believe they came out within 2 days to measure and give me a quote. It was under 600.00. After I gave them the go ahead to order the replacement glass I was told it would take 2-3 weeks and that was fine with me but they came in at least a week sooner and they installed them within two days of calling me to say they were in!! John and James arrived right on time and were finished quickly and left behind no mess.  The even answered my questions and explained the process to me patiently.  I will definitely use them again!  I appreciate their exemplary customer service!

resp.text: Meike, we are so glad to have been able to provide you with a great experience and are thankful that you took the time to provide an in depth review. We really appreciate your feedback and will be happy to help you in the future!

We had a storm window recently broken while the yard was being mowed.

name: John Bearden
text: I'm allergic to cats...and was greeted by one when I entered the door. Honestly I don't know more to say. I left quickly.

resp.text: I am sorry we were not able to assist you with your glass needs. We have actually had a cat at this location since it opened in 1941, but we are aware people have allergies to cats and will gladly make accommodations to serve you best. If you can let us know that you have an allergy to cats before coming to the store or tell us you have an allergy when you walk in the door we will gladly put the cat up. We are sorry to have inconvenienced you and would be happy to earn your business in the future.

name: Heather Baumbach
text: Wonderful and fast service and great craftsmanship!

name: Blake Hargrove
text:
*** UPDATE ***
Rating - 3/5
The manager called back, apologizing for the experience we had. He seemed very sincere and wanted to earn our business, but we had already signed an agreement with a different company.

Where the individual we interacted did not show professionalism and courtesy, Huntsville Glass Company's manager did. We'll consider them for service in the future, solely based off our interaction with their manager.
******

Rating - 2/5
I'd consider giving a better review if I could actually get them to come out and provide an estimate. For 2 weeks, we've been attempting to get on their schedule. Instead, we get last minute phone calls stating that they're in the area and can stop by. If we could get maybe a 2 hour head's-up, we could accommodate Huntsville Glass' busy schedule.

Our most recent interaction ended with the individual hanging up abruptly. I suppose they're busy enough they don't need to take the time to schedule estimations with customers 2 hours in advance.

name: Lila King
text: Prompt, honest, and friendly team are experts in their field!

resp.text: We really appreciate you taking the time to give us a review Lila. Your feedback is appreciated and we are always glad to hear that our team has taken great care of our customers. If you have any future glass needs we are happy to help!

name: Stacy Tankersley
text:
I would not recommend this place.  The front desk has about the most unfriendliest, unhelpful ladies I have ever worked with.  After more than two weeks when the glass was finally ready for pickup they left a message that it was ready and for me to bring my own packing material because it will not be in any packaging there….  Really?
It also took two trips with all the measurements they ask for the glass, and I even provide pictures since it is going in an old house with no square corners.  After picking the piece up, packing it in my own material and getting it home, it did not fit.  I took the glass by Absolute Glass Service on Church and without an appointment or calling they had it cut correctly and the edges polished in five minutes for the whole sum of ten dollars.  I gave them a twenty for being so customer oriented.

name: Robert Bois
text:
I just moved to Foley from Huntsville and unfortunately I had a very poor moving company. As such, they broke the glass door on my very old and beautiful grandfather clock, beveled glass too. Enter Tammie and Dawn from One Cut Glass. When they finished fixing my clock door, I was just speechless as to how beautiful it all turned out. Tempered glass with perfect beveled edges with curves no less! I did not think it could be done, but Tammie and Dawn and One Cut Glass came through with flying colors. And the price was far, far lower than I could ever have expected. As a new resident to this area, I certainly know where to go now for all my custom glass needs. Thank you ever so much!

Well done!

name: Candace Hawkins
text: ICS Roofing is a GREAT Company!!! Jamie was very professional and compassionate. He sat down with my mother and I and explained the cost and what to expect. We were told it would be 3 weeks but they started the next week ( a few days later). The crew were very nice and respectful. I recommend this company if you want a professional and trustworthy company. New roof for a GREAT price.

name: Victoria Gann
text: They are great to work with. They installed one roof for me. Repaired a different one and found the source of the leak, vent cap damaged. They have fixed flashing for me and fixed several worn boots at different properties. They have also inspected a roof for a new purchase and was able to give me a detailed report. They are the most responsive and thorough business I have ever dealt with.

name: April Orr
text: From the initial contact with ICS, I was impressed with their professionalism and attention to detail. Scott was such a pleasure to work with and gave me all of the details and options I needed to make the best decision for my home. He did such a great job keeping me updated that I never had to wonder what was going on with my project and in fact, when he gave me a timeline, things were completed ahead of that. Scott clearly enjoys his job and I value his expertise and passion to perform at the highest of his abilities. The roofers themselves were polite, clean and on-time. They were respectful of my property and ensured none of my plants were damaged and my yard was completely spotless before they left. I received several quotes for my job and Scott and his boss worked diligently to not only earn our business, but to make our insurance claim payment stretch as far as possible. I would recommend ICS without hesitation.

name: Carol Ann Simonds
text: I had a leak and they came within a few hrs of calling to tarp it.  I had a whole roof + decking put on a few weeks later and they were professional, worked well w our Insurance company. Crew was much quicker than the previous roofing company from 15 years ago. Start to finish,  good experience.

name: Sherry Oldham-Coffee
text: Recently had ICS do a roof on an older home. Jonathan was very professional and pleasant when giving the bid and all throughout the process. Communication was fantastic. Had 3 bids and I usually go with the middle bid but I was so impressed with the thorough inspection and bid that I chose ICS even though theirs was the lowest of the three. Had to wait about a month or so for roof to actually go on. Roof looks great and they didn't leave any mess behind so that was also a plus. I would highly recommend ICS Roofing.

name: Beth Kristensen
text: If you need work done to your roof, this is the BEST company to use.  Jonathan came to our home, explained what was needed (a whole new roof) and why.  We had noticed some shingles had fallen from our roof but he showed us pictures of many other shingles (that we were unaware of) that had also blown off.  ICS dealt with our homeowners insurance through the whole process.  The entire company is honest and courteous.  Jonathan kept us informed from start to finish, and everything was done exactly as he promised.  The roof was replaced, the job was done quickly and more importantly, perfectly.  Our new roof is beautiful and the crew that installed it left the exterior of our home and yard cleaner than they found it.  Do not hesitate to use ICS!  Thank you ICS!!

name: Mark Wells
text: From start to finish, this company was highly professional. Project manager, David, was exceptional through the entire process and the work done high quality. Good prices with excellent results.

name: Karen Bishop
text:
I have never had a company work as hard as this one did to get my roof replaced with a days notice.  I cannot stress how great this company was and especially Jonathan Weston who stayed in touch with me from the time the adjuster came until the day it was completed.
He went above and beyond for me.
Thank you ICS for having personnel that cares!

name: gary White
text: Very prompt response,  professional service, HONEST(VERY IMPORTANT,  TO ME). QUALITY WORK AT A COMPETITIVE PRICE. THANKS FOR TAKING CARE OF MY MOMS HOME. WE WILL CALL YOU AGAIN.

name: Katie Loughrist
text: We really appreciated the great customer service we received from this company! They were even generous enough to donate a bit of extra gutters for my garden and for my friend who needed some. They were quick and respectful. When we told them of the few issues we found with the installation, they made it right immediately. Support this local business. They will do right by you!

name: Beverly McCainey
text:
Johnathan was very professional and kept me abreast of everything going on with my home... I was texted of pictures and text messages..... I would recommend this company to my friends and family.
Thank You again,
Beverly A. McCainey

name: Patrick James
text: I had active leaks from storm damage that went unnoticed until water began running into my home. I needed help taking the right steps to quickly stop the damage that was occurring and I did not know who to ask.  I happened to mention my plight to an ICS employee who had dropped by the business where I work, and the ICS team literally did the rest. My project manager, David Prejeant, contacted me,  took the time, and made every effort to baby step me through the proceedures with little worry on my part.  Once the day was set, their install team efficiently and professionally installed our new roof. Once the job was complete, the install team left very little evidence that anyone had been on my roof and my property other than the roof was obviously new and the leaks had stopped.  Then,  the thing that was the ultimate reward for having done business with them, ICS sent an inspector back out after completion to insure the work met their high standards of quality.  On this inspection trip,  the gentleman took extra time to run a magnet around to check again that no troublesome tacks were left behind.  I am thankful I shared my plight with the right person that day!

name: Steveandpamela Valdez
text: They did the work fast and were very thorough. The workers were extremely well disciplined and made sure everything was covered, including our pool, to insure a clean job. When they were through, you couldn’t tell the workers were ever here except for the wonderful roof.  Special thanks to Scott for working so efficiently with us to get everything taken care of in a timely manner.

name: Chip Lazenby
text: Just had roof replaced by Jamie Harris with ICS roofing in Sheffield. Excellent work, start to finish. Jamie was very patient, professional and helpful from start to finish. He made the process easy and non-stressful. The work crew did an excellent job and were friendly and professional. Check these guys out if you need a new roof.

name: Jane Chasan
text:
ICS said it might be 2-4 weeks before my roofing, but were able to schedule sooner. The roofing crew worked 14 hours to replace my roof in one day. The only break they took was for lunch. The cleanup was great.
I would recommend ICS for your roofing needs. Jamie Harris was very nice to work with.
I have several neighbors who have used this business and all were pleased with their work.

name: Caleb Danley
text: Friendly, on-time service.  Replaced the roof, start to finish, in one day.  Very professional from start to cleanup.  Jonathan was great to deal with.  From the beginning he was upfront and honest in regards to the work that was to be completed and the time frame it was going to take.   10/10 would use them again.

name: Patricia Roemer
text: Highly recommend ICS roofing. From the professional estimator Scott Breakfield who was on time, so courteous, answered all my questions, explained the contract, warranties, and  returned calls promptly,  to the super hard working and courteous crew  who did a top notch job on my new roof.  Great job on clean up too, with no damage to shrubs and lawn. Just had Scott out again to have ICS do my gutters. Highly recommend you give him a call.

name: Randy Holm
text: ICS does fantastic work. They have done a couple roofing jobs for us. They are always very professional and do exactly what they say they will do. It is such a pleasure doing business with everyone at ICS. For something as important as a roof, I would recommend ICS to do the job and do it right.

name: Jess Dysert
text: We were traveling in a motorhome and the windshield was hit by a rock from a passing semi. Created a pretty big star chip in the windshield. We were about three hours west of Annsiton. Called Glass Doctor, although they were booked for the day Cheryl said she would see if they could help us after we arrived at the Gander RV park in Anniston. She called us back just as we were arriving at the RV park. She told us the tech would be calling us shortly. He did and arrived within 30 min. Although the damage to the windshield  was larger than a quarter he repaired it and the results were perfect. Thank you Cheryl for making the extra effort to get us service and thanks to the tech for the excellent job.

text: quick and a great job , loved the service ,and they did a great job and was the cheapest in town!!!

name: Deborah Jones
text: The glass in my mom's door had cracked into a million pieces.  She had called all theses different places trying to get help.  I googled the glass doctor and found the number.  I then sent a text and when texted back told me they were only doing business work.  I explained the situation and that same day they came out measured the glass and ordered it. On Monday they replaced it.  These guys are Awesome!

text: Was able to fit us in and repair our windshield.  Little waiting time.  Awesome staff.  Thank yall so much for working with us and our busy schedule.

name: Sally Gaines
text:
I called them several times over 2 months trying to see if they could replace a window for me they never returned my calls. I called a few times in a row she answered. I sent her the information she was to get back to me. After several days I text her she said she didn’t know yet that was on May 7 today is May 18 still with no answers.
Only place in town. We really need a company that will talk to us and wants work. They should just close up as they seem to have no interest in doing any work.
If it were the virus you would think they would say we can do as soon as things clear up but to never respond or answer is like closing the doors.
